mdRecord.dcterms:title: United States / Drawn & engraved by J. Dower, Pentonville, London
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Dower, John, active 1838-1846? [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 1 map ; 34 x 41 cm. on sheet 39 x 47 cm.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Note at upper right: "The boundry between the British Possessions and the United States is shown as settled by treaty, August 9th 1842." [original]
Florida is shown as a state, but Texas is presented as a blank slate, with no internal detail south of the Red River. [original]
Shows boundaries, rivers and principal settlements. [original]
Plate number "37" in upper and lower right margins. [original]
United States, east of the Missouri River, with rivers extending westward through the Missouri Territory and Great Desert [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: United States--Maps
